programme.title: NHL Hockey Montreal Canadiens at Washington Capitals
programme.desc: The Eastern Conference-best Capitals host the Canadiens for Game 1 of a first-round set. Montreal was the final team to punch its ticket to the postseason. Washington has lost its last five playoff series since winning the 2018 Stanley Cup Final.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Colorado Avalanche at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The injury-depleted Stars try to tie up their first-round series with the Avalanche entering Game 2. Without key players Jason Robertson and Miro Heiskanen, Dallas couldn't stop Colorado's attack in Game 1, falling 5-1. Nathan MacKinnon scored twice.

programme.title: NHL Hockey New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.sub-title: New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to take a 2-0 lead on the Devils in Game 2 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal. Carolina outshot New Jersey 45-24 en route to a 4-1 victory in Game 1 behind forward Logan Stankoven's second two-goal playoff performance.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.desc: Sunshine State rivals in the Lightning and Panthers play Game 1 of an Eastern Conference first-round series. The clubs have met in three of the last four postseasons with Tampa Bay (2021) and Florida (2024) both advancing to win the Stanley Cup.
